itemInfo.itemDesc:
Thick yogurt with lots of aloe in it.
- Unique effect: Fishing Speed Rank +1 for 45min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Aloe
item.desc: Aloe is a specialty of Mediah.\nUsage: Aloe Cookie, Aloe Yogurt, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at Ahto Farm. Mediah Aloe can also be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Sugar
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Leavening Agent
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
